item.title: Contour Example 6: Adding Labels to Contours
item.description: Contour Example 6: Adding Labels to Contours      This example is also available on YouTube. Introduction In this example, we are adding a label to a contour. The label provides information about measurements and about the contour itself. The label remains connected to the contour and can be moved via mouse interactions. Steps to do Develop your network Add a LocalImage and a View2D module to your workspace and connect them as shown below.
